segments.text: I was looking for the Resume Writing Workshop .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You came to the right spot . Come on in and join us !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am not really sure that I remember how to even put a resume together .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am here to show you how to put together the perfect resume . It will turn out great !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We need to put our name and contact information across the top .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can list your education at the top , or choose your job experience to be there if it is more impressive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could I list my interests and special skills next ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that that would work out quite well as an ending for your resume .
segments.speaker: S2
